verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בְּב֤וֹא ׀ <WH935> came דּוֹאֵ֣ג <WH1673> when Doeg הָאֲדֹמִי֮ <WH130> the Edomite וַיַּגֵּ֪ד <WH5046> and told לְשָׁ֫א֥וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֑וֹ בָּ֥א <WH935> is come דָ֝וִ֗ד <WH1732> unto him David אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house אֲחִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH288> of Ahimelech מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> Why boastest בְּ֭רָעָה <WH7451> thou thyself in mischief הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> O mighty חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> man? the goodness אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> of God כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> [endureth] continually

הַ֭וּוֹת <WH1942> mischiefs תַּחְשֹׁ֣ב <WH2803> deviseth לְשׁוֹנֶ֑ךָ <WH3956> Thy tongue כְּתַ֥עַר <WH8593> razor מְ֝לֻטָּ֗שׁ <WH3913> like a sharp עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> working רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> deceitfully

אָהַ֣בְתָּ <WH157> Thou lovest רָּ֣ע <WH7451> evil מִטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> more than good שֶׁ֓קֶר ׀ <WH8267> [and] lying מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> rather than to speak צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> righteousness סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
אָהַ֥בְתָּ <WH157> Thou lovest כָֽל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> words בָ֗לַע <WH1105> all devouring לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> O [thou] deceitful

גַּם־ <WH1571> But אֵל֮ <WH410> God יִתָּצְךָ֪ <WH5422> shall likewise destroy לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <WH5331> thee for ever יַחְתְּךָ֣ <WH2846> he shall take thee away וְיִסָּחֲךָ֣ <WH5255> and pluck thee out מֵאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of [thy] dwelling place וְשֵֽׁרֶשְׁךָ֨ <WH8327> and root thee out מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> of the living סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
וְיִרְא֖וּ <WH7200> also shall see צַדִּיקִ֥ים <WH6662> The righteous וְיִירָ֗אוּ <WH3372> and fear וְעָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and יִשְׂחָֽקוּ׃ <WH7832> and shall laugh

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הַגֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> Lo [this is] the man לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> [that] made אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> not God מָֽע֫וּזּ֥וֹ <WH4581> his strength וַ֭יִּבְטַח <WH982> but trusted בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> in the abundance עָשְׁר֑וֹ <WH6239> of his riches יָ֝עֹ֗ז <WH5810> [and] strengthened בְּהַוָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH1942> himself in his wickedness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I כְּזַ֣יִת <WH2132> olive tree רַ֭עֲנָן <WH7488> But I [am] like a green בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God בָּטַ֥חְתִּי <WH982> I trust בְחֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> in the mercy אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

אוֹדְךָ֣ <WH3034> I will praise לְ֭עוֹלָם <WH5769> thee for ever כִּ֣י <WH3588> because עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> because thou hast done וַאֲקַוֶּ֖ה <WH6960> [it] and I will wait שִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> on thy name כִֽי־ <WH3588> because ט֝֗וֹב <WH2896> for [it is] good נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> the presence חֲסִידֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2623> before thy saints
